short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality of life features for the blue websight.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds extra quality of life features to make browsing and posting easier.

Features include:
Keyword ignorator
User notes
User ignorator
User highlighter
Twitter embeds
Markdown buttons
Dramalinks ticker
Marking topic creator
Red dot
& more!
